info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: Backward Clock
collection.openText: Have you fallen to the lowest bottom?

specialTipSize.specialTip: A light turns off and energy is charged for every work done on $0.
Nothing happened when an employee whose level is lower than 3 worked on it.
After every light has turned on, $0 can be activated. However, $0 could only be operated once a day, so use caution when using it.
<Caution>Employees under level 5 is strictly forbidden from contacting $0 after it is fully charged.
Employee with level 5 or more can operate $0 normally. $0 will send everyone except the employee who activated it to the most peaceful time of that day.
